channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - efi

item.title: Added UEFI instructions to AMD64/x86 handbooks
item.description: I just finished up adding some UEFI instructions to the Gentoo handbooks for AMD64 and x86 (I don't know how many systems are still using x86 instead of the AMD64 one, and if those support UEFI, but the instructions are shared and they don't collide). The entire EFI stuff can …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: Switching to new laptop
item.description: I'm slowly but surely starting to switch to a new laptop. The old one hasn't completely died (yet) but given that I had to force its CPU frequency at the lowest Hz or the CPU would burn (and the system suddenly shut down due to heat issues), and that the …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
